title: Jander Moreira
text:
\(\LaTeX\)








Packages






algxpar
This package streamlines pseudocode creation by effectively managing lengthy lines without disrupting formatting integrity. It further introduces visualization styles and keyword a translation system.
 


packdoc
The packdocs package offers a variety of features for documenting \(\LaTeX\) packages, ensuring consistent presentation, cross-referencing, and index generation. It also supports version and change tracking to maintain a consistent change history.
 


dsdraw
Design schematic layouts for data structures, including arrays, linked lists, and related constructs.



palettize
Enhance documents with color via styled text blocks and formatted lists, sourced from predefined color palettes.



folha de ponto
Monta uma folha de ponto mensal simples para empregado doméstico.












Beamer






LALIC theme
Theme for LALIC
